title: Ticket #1472: SANDBOX_TRANSFER_METHOD undocumented
description: The submit description file knob SANDBOX_TRANSFER_METHOD is honored by condor_submit, but is not documented.
remarks:
2010-Jun-21 14:28:07 by tannenba:
Looks like this was added by Zach back in Feb 2007, related to submit side privsep work??

2010-Oct-07 15:39:13 by zmiller:
the flag was added to condor_submit as part of enabling priv-sep on the submit side. however, that work is incomplete and this flag to condor_submit should not be used. i argue therefore it should also not be documented until the priv-sep work is complete.
creator: tannenba
